pr_title: fix: use separate config dir for running local minio server in functional tests

timeline.bodyText: Can we remove this environment variable? Since this is a breaking change or should we keep this for backward compatibility?
timeline.author: kannappanr

replies.bodyText: I don't why it is useful though @kannappanr
replies.author: harshavardhana

timeline.message: fix: set region to empty to avoid loading local ENVs
fix: set region to empty to avoid loading local ENVs

timeline.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: There is no purpose for this @balamurugana - can you explain why this exists?
replies.author: harshavardhana

replies.bodyText: It is needed when running functional tests manually ./gradlew runFunctionalTest -Pendpoint=ENDPOINT -PaccessKey=ACCESSKEY -PsecretKey=SECRETKEY -Pregion=REGION; otherwise tests depend on sqsArn wouldn't run. There is no code without its purpose.
replies.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: Are you expecting users to know all of this run functional tests?
replies.author: harshavardhana

replies.bodyText: Yes. In fact users never run functional tests, but developers do. If a developer is indented to test minio-java himself apart from CI, he has an option to do so. Also note that, Mint runs functional tests to test minio server by this way.
replies.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: Yes but this is completely wrong,  one way is env, and another way is command line. It looks clunky way to test things. Why have this option in the first place?
replies.author: harshavardhana

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure the env is changed from "MINT_KEY_ID" to "MINT_KMS_KEY_NAME"?
timeline.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: there is no MINT_KEY_ID env in mint @balamurugana - I just added this to make sure we keep it the same as MINIO_JAVA_TEST_KMS_KEY_NAME
replies.author: harshavardhana

replies.bodyText: MINT_KEY_ID was introduced in #694 and available since last two years. Do you say it was a mistake in the PR?
replies.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: Yes it is not at all present in mint, it has been long removed.
replies.author: harshavardhana

timeline.message: fix: set region to empty to avoid loading local ENVs
fix: set region to empty to avoid loading local ENVs
